intro: Jeffreycia zeylanica, commonly known as the Ceylon starling tree, is a flowering plant native to Sri Lanka. It belongs to the family Rutaceae and is characterized by its distinctive star-shaped flowers. The plant has small, elliptical leaves with a smooth surface and a fragrant aroma. It thrives in tropical climates and is often found in moist, well-drained soils. Due to its ornamental value, it is occasionally cultivated in botanical gardens.
